mapper.select: SELECT blog_name as blogName, blog_address as blogAddress, title, description, link, created_at as createdAt FROM blog_post ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{rows}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_post ( blog_name, blog_address, title, description, link, created_at ) VALUES ( #{blogName}, #{blogAddress}, #{title}, #{description}, #{link}, #{createdAt} )
